It's good to see them, isn't it? 
On Sunday, the stars aligned inside a sprawling airplane hangar in Santa Monica, California, for the Screen Actors Guild Awards, the first proper awards show of 202… [+6101 chars]

articles.author: Carlos Greer
articles.title: Stephen Colbert called meeting to 'calm the panic' over Chris Licht exit - Page Six
articles.description: The “Late Show” host had a “rather jovial” Zoom call with staffers Saturday after news broke that their showrunner was leaving to replace Jeff Zucker at CNN.
articles.content:
Stephen Colbert held an emergency meeting Saturday to ease “Late Show” staffers’ fears about their showrunner, Chris Licht, being poached by CNN, Page Six has learned.
